transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to a given address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another using allowance.

approve.description: Approves a specified amount of tokens for another address.

permit.description: Allows a specified address to spend a certain amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the underlying ERC20 token and the rewards cycle length.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator used in EIP-712.

asset.description: Returns the address of the underlying ERC20 asset.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a given address.

convertToAssets.description: Converts a specified amount of shares to assets.

convertToShares.description: Converts a specified amount of assets to shares.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

deposit.description: Deposits a specified amount of assets and receives shares.

depositWithSignature.description: Deposits a specified amount of assets with a signature and receives shares.

maxDeposit.description: Returns the maximum amount that can be deposited for a given address.

maxMint.description: Returns the maximum amount of shares that can be minted for a given address.

maxRedeem.description: Returns the maximum amount of shares that can be redeemed for a given address.

maxWithdraw.description: Returns the maximum amount of assets that can be withdrawn for a given address.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of assets for a given number of shares.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce value for a given address.

previewDeposit.description: Returns the amount of shares received for a given amount of assets.

previewMint.description: Returns the amount of assets received for a given number of shares.

previewRedeem.description: Returns the amount of assets received for a given number of shares.

previewWithdraw.description: Returns the amount of shares received for a given amount of assets.

pricePerShare.description: Returns the current price per share.

redeem.description: Redeems a specified number of shares for assets.

rewardsCycleEnd.description: Returns the end of the current rewards cycle.

rewardsCycleLength.description: Returns the length of the rewards cycle.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

syncRewards.description: Synchronizes rewards to the current cycle.

totalAssets.description: Returns the total assets held by the contract.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of shares.

withdraw.description: Withdraws a specified amount of assets and receives shares.
